name: Intergalactic Wizard Force (EN-IT)
description:
Proposta di traduzione EN-IT di Intergalactic Wizard Force per la LocJam 2022.

Team members: Cristina De Tora (https://sselep.itch.io/), Eleonora Fabbri (https://itch.io/profile/elyanne), Claudio Lenato (https://itch.io/profile/claudiolenato), Maria Luisa Piemontese (https://oujidere.itch.io/), Paola Poletti (https://polachan.itch.io/) e Angelo Gallinaro (https://rosemountain1994.itch.io/). 

Translated and edited using Google Sheets :D

(Our second LocJam project together, we had a blast AGAIN!)
